The quiz is consisted of 7 questions. Questions 1-5 are single answer question. Question 6 has 2 possible answers and for question 7 the answer needs to be typed in. All correct questions are scored as 1, even the check box question with 2 possible answers.
In order for the check box answer to be correct, both choices need to be correct in order to score points!
HINT: The correct answer is a single word. After you have typed the answer be sure to confirm it on the keyboard in order to see the final score !
